name: Punk girl
intro_dialogue: Man! I'm too good at this!
Let's try talking to that girl over there!
She looks like a botanist witch.
With that small witch cap, she must be a junior witch.

questions.text: Look. The fact that you're still here means you don't get it. Leave.

replies.text: But I haven't said anything yet.
Just give me a chance to talk to you at least.
But I want to know why you're green.
replies.response: I'm purposefully speeding up the song now.

questions.text: Urgh... You're lucky I can't leave right now. Okay. Fine. Let's talk. But I'm not making it easy on you.

replies.text: Try me. I can handle it.
replies.response: Trust me. I don't want to.

replies.text: Well not if you don't want to.
replies.response: No. I'm bored anyway. Entertain me.
Good. I don't really like them.

replies.text: No. But I can hit notes on a beat.
replies.response: Well, let's find out if you can, cause I'm speeding it up again.

questions.text: Seen any guys around here in a red hoodie?

replies.text: Oh yeah, saw him in the bathroom a minute ago.

questions.text: What do you know about plants?

replies.text: Studied them for a while as a hobby.
I know they don't make people green.

questions.text: Do you prefer magical beasts or magical plants?

replies.response: Oh~ So you think you're something? That's cute.
Not earning yourself any points with me, buddy. Plants all the way.

questions.text: Oh. You're... You're actually keeping up with me talking. I underestimated you.

replies.response: Oh no... Now he shows up?..

replies.text: I already know where this is going...
Man.. It was just getting good.

questions.text: So you're talking to my girlfriend, huh?

replies.text: Nope. Just talking to boost my conversation skills.
replies.response: Oh really now? What a terrible excuse..

questions.text: You must think you're a tough guy if you're talking to a man's girl right in front of him.

replies.text: Well, my image is a bit more muscular compared to yours..
I was just talking to witches to train myself.
There's no need to be so hostile.
replies.response: Don't talk to my girl then.

questions.text: Just ignore him, babe. He's just someone that walked up to talk to me.

replies.text: I was only talking to her to get better at talking to witches.
replies.response: Which I would say you're already getting really good at.
Come on, he's not that bad, I swear, babe.

questions.text: Just... Just answer me this! Are you aiming to steal her from me?

replies.text: No. But I understand the worry bro.

questions.text: Okay. Okay. Let's leave this weirdo alone, babe.

replies.text: Have a nice night, I guess...
Maybe I should be more careful who I talk to next...

punkgirl: If you're just gonna ignore me then walk away.
I know how to poison every food you'v ever eaten.
boyfriend: This isn't something you can just walk away from.
